data.title: SS Lazio: Breaking News, Rumors & Highlights
data.meta_description: SS Lazio rumors, news and videos from the best sources on the web. Sign up for the SS newsletter!
data.text:
Joy And Despair Of Boxing On Full Display In Angelo Leo’s KO Win Over Luis Alberto Lopez

Angelo Leo produced one of the knockouts of the year on Saturday when his savage one-punch stoppage of Luis Alberto Lopez saw him become the IBF featherweight world champion.

Lazio Preparing Offer for Southampton Midfielder but Face Competition From Flamengo

Lazio are reportedly set to formulate an offer for young Southampton midfielder Carlos Alcaraz. The 21-year-old has recently landed on Angelo Fabiani’s wishlist as the Biancocelesti look to bolster their midfield department with one more addition.

Lazio Schedule Key Meeting With Agent to Wrap up Salernitana Star’s Transfer – Figures Revealed

Lazio are now seeking an agreement with the agent of Boulaye Dia after reaching an accord with Salernitana over the player’s transfer. The Biancocelesti have recently revived their interest in the French-Senegalese striker and are now in a hurry to add him to Marco Baroni’s ranks before the start of the campaign.

Napoli Midfielder Pushing for Lazio Return After Conte Row

Michael Folorunsho is on his way out of Napoli after failing to see eye to eye with Antonio Conte, and is reportedly aiming for a return to Lazio. The 26-year-old spent a few years at the Italian capital club’s youth academy before being released in 2017.

Transfer Saga: Lazio & Salernitana Striker Boulaye Dia

This article follows the Transfer Saga concerning Lazio’s interest in Salernitana’s Boulaye Dia. The 27-year-old Senegalese striker has been linked with a move to the Biancocelesti since April of 2024.

Transfer Saga: Lazio & Feyenoord Attacking Midfielder Calvin Stengs

This article follows the Transfer Saga concerning Lazio’s interest in Feyenoord’s Calvin Stengs. The 25-year-old Dutch attacker has been linked with a move to the Biancocelesti since January of 2024.

Newcomers Shine as Lazio Beat Cadiz in Final Pre-Season Friendly

Lazio wrapped up their summer tour with a slim win over Cadiz at the Stadio Nuevo Mirandilla in Spain. Marco Baroni unleashed a 4-3-3 formation spearheaded as usual by Taty Castellanos, with Gustav Isaksen and club captain Mattia Zaccagni on the wings.

Lazio Identify Chelsea Youngster as Alternative to Napoli Wantaway

Lazio are still hoping to secure a deal for Michael Folorunsho, but are reportedly keeping tabs on Cesare Casadei as a Plan B. The Biancocelesti are currently working on signing a new striker in the shape of Boulaye Dia before wrapping up the squad by adding a new midfielder to the fold.

Lazio Secure a Deal for Salernitana Star Following Shocking Blitz – Figures Revealed

Lazio are suddenly on the cusp of signing Salernitana striker Boulaye Dia on the back of a swift onslaught. The Biancocelesti were heavily linked with the Senegal international earlier in the summer, but the story eventually faded, with the club apparently deciding to pursue a pure winger – like Armand Laurienté – rather than a centre-forward.

Transfer Saga: Lazio & Sassuolo Winger Armand Lauriente

This article follows the Transfer Saga concerning Lazio’s interest in Sassuolo’s Armand Lauriente. The 25-year-old French winger has been linked with a move to the Biancocelesti since June of 2024.

Luis Alberto Lopez vs. Angelo Leo: Press Conference Quotes and Fight Prediction

Luis Alberto Lopez (30-2, 17 KOs) returns to the ring to defend his IBF featherweight title against Angelo Leo (24-1, 11 KOs). The two fighters headline a Top Rank card – in association with Legacy Boxing Promotions – at the Tingley Coliseum in Albuquerque, NM.

This Week In Lazio History | August 5-11 | Matches, Memories, Birthdays

This week we remember the fantastic win in the Super Coppa 2009 in Beijing, several pre-season friendlies, and the passing of Orlando Rozzoni. Date: Monday, August 5, 2002 Venue: Pride Stadium Park, Derby Fixture: Derby County Lazio 1-2, pre-season friendly An evenly balanced game is decided by a Crespo winner.

Southampton Name Their Price for Ex Juventus Midfielder Wanted at Lazio

Lazio have reportedly learned the asking price set by Southampton for their new transfer target Carlos Alcaraz. The Biancocelesti are currently exploring the market in search of young profiles, and the Argentine has recently landed on Angelo Fabiani’s shortlist.

Lazio Make First Contact for Napoli Wantaway Midfielder

Lazio have reportedly made the first step in their attempts to bring Napoli midfielder Michael Folorunsho back to the Italian capital. The 26-year-old spent two years among Lazio’s youth ranks before departing in 2017.

Young Lazio Winger Has Five Serie A Suitors as Genoa Join the Queue

Matteo Cancellieri might be an outcast at Lazio, but he’s apparently a wanted man in Serie A, as Genoa emerge as his latest suitor. The 22-year-old is a Roma academy product who rose to prominence during his stint at Hellas Verona.

Lazio Add Exciting Wolverhampton Teenager to Attacking Shortlist

Young Wolverhampton Wanderers winger Enso Gonzalez becomes the latest teenager to be linked with a possible move to Lazio this summer. The Biancocelesti president Claudio Lotito promised to buy a new player born in 2005 earlier this summer, so news outlets have been on a mission to decipher the identity of the newcomer.

Castellanos Scores Wonder Goal as Lazio & Southampton Draw In Fiery Friendly

Lazio registered a 1-1 draw against Southampton at St. Marry’s Stadium in their penultimate friendly of the pre-season. The hosts started on the right foot, scoring the opener in the fifth minute through a clever strike from Bereton Diaz from the edge of the box.

Will Luis Alberto Lopez fight Naoya Inoue? Why top featherweight boxer vs. The Monster has Fight of the Year potential

If Luis Alberto Lopez can defeat Angelo Leo, then he could be in line for the super fight of a lifetime. The Sporting News takes a deep dive into a potential matchup between Lopez and the great Naoya Inoue.

Baroni Keen to Reunite With Napoli Midfielder at Lazio – Price Tag Revealed

Lazio coach Marco Baroni is hoping to have Michael Folorunsho at his disposal once more following their prosperous collaboration at Hellas Verona last season.
